headline: Analyst @ Eversana | Former Intern @ Porter | BIT Mesra
about: Hello! I'm Meghna Singh, a Chemical Engineering graduate from BIT Mesra, Ranchi, with a strong passion for data science, analytics, research, and consultancy. My journey has been shaped by impactful experiences at Eversana, Porter, DailyObjects and TATA Cummins, where I worked on diverse projects ranging from healthcare analytics and operational efficiency to product research and material characterization. These opportunities have honed my skills in Excel, SQL, Python, and Power BI, while also strengthening my problem-solving and strategic thinking abilities. I’m eager to leverage my technical background and analytical acumen to deliver innovative, data-driven solutions and make meaningful contributions in the world of analytics and consulting. Let’s connect and explore possibilities together!
skills: Endorsed by 1 person in the last 6 months
